phrase: why the long face?
Make hay while the sun shines.
Learning is like rowing upstream; not to advance is to drop back.
cn: 學如逆水行舟,不進則退

phrase: Build a castle in the air.
A stitch in time saves nine.
Every minute makes a difference.
Never put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
As you sow, so shall you reap.
Constant dropping wears away the stone.
cn: 滴水穿石/有志者事竟成

phrase: Diligence can make up for lack of intelligence.
Let sleeping dogs lie.
Let bydones be bygones.
Learing without thinking is vain; thinking without learning is perilous.
cn: 學而不思則罔;思而不學則殆

phrase: A blessing in disguise.
Actions speak louder than words.
Look before you leap.
To say is one thing; to do is another.
cn: 說是一回事,做是另一回事

phrase: Easier said than done.
It takes two to make a quarrel.
Do not put the cat before the horse.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Haste makes waste.
Where there is a will, there is a way.
It is no use crying over spilt milk.
It is never too late to mend.
He who makes no mistake makes nothing.
cn: 從錯誤中學習方能有所成就

phrase: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
cn: 事情無真正好壞,是想法造就其如此

phrase: Do not meet trouble halfway.
make hey while the sun shine
Still waters run deep.
It is more blessed to give than to receive.
What goes around comes around.
God never shuts one door but He opens another.
A single spark can start a prairie fire.
A friend in need is a friend indeed.
A man is known by the company he keeps.
Prosperity makes friends; adversity tries them.
cn: 富足時候多朋友,患難時期見真情

phrase: All that glitter is not gold.
Do to others as you would have others do to you.
To err is human,to forgive divine.
cn: 凡人皆有錯,寬恕則超凡神聖

phrase: A contented mind is a perprtual feast.
Turn a stumbling block into a stepping stone.
The fittest survive.
One swallow does not make a summer.
cn: 一燕不足以知夏/勿以偏概全

phrase: Birds of a feather flock together.
Nothing venture,nothing gain.
It never rains but it pours.
Procrastination is the thief of time.
It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
cn: 勿言事難,夢想或能成真

phrase: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
A rolling stone gathers no moss.
cn: 滾石不生苔/見異思遷者易無所成就

phrase: Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass, but rather learning to dance in the rain.
cn: 人生不是在等待暴風雨經過,而是學會在雨中起舞/人生總會遇見許多困難,學會面對勿讓其阻礙了你

phrase: Time and tide wait for no man. Both continue to go on and on, without ever stopping.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
cn: 生命中許多失敗,往往是人們不知其放棄時離成功僅差一步之遙
